title: (x) Formaggio's font Pizzeria & Restaurant logo - Fontleroy Brown {Rainer}
content:
Hello

Someone please tell me the font used for “ormaggios”... Thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121083444im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_5560.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Freakshow sturdy serif face with swashes - ITC Bookman Swash {Norbert}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121083444/http:/typophile.com/node/38454 "Go to previous forum topic") [Newhouse vs Helvetica ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121083444/http:/typophile.com/node/38441 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: [Fontleroy Brown](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121083444/http:/www.dafont.com/fontleroy-brown.font?nb_ppp=50&af=on&text=Formaggios) by the incredible Old Nick and he made the F for you, too.
